attributes.action: A memorial or shrine to the memory of Kurdish refugees Aylan and Galip Kurdi.
attributes.additional_details: Images of Aylan and Galip whose physical life was unfulfilled but in death has influenced the world and had a profound effect on peoples opinions of the Syrian refugee crisis, the human cost of conflict and Britain's deep compassion and wider role in the crisis.
attributes.background: Aylan Kurdi was a 3 year old Kurdish refugee who drowned along with his mother and brother Galip aged 5 while trying to escape unimaginable conditions in his homeland.
